description: Detects an executable in the Windows folder accessing suspicious domains
author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
name: Microsoft Binary Suspicious Communication Endpoint
query: (event.category:network AND ((process.executable:(/[Cc]\:\\[Pp][Ee][Rr][Ff][Ll][Oo][Gg][Ss].*/ OR /[Cc]\:\\[Tt][Ee][Mm][Pp]\\.*/ OR /[Cc]\:\\[Uu][Ss][Ee][Rr][Ss]\\[Pp][Uu][Bb][Ll][Ii][Cc]\\.*/ OR /[Cc]\:\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\.*/)) OR (process.executable:/.*\\[Aa][Pp][Pp][Dd][Aa][Tt][Aa]\\[Tt][Ee][Mm][Pp]\\.*/)) AND (winlog.event_data.Initiated:true AND destination.domain:(/.*\.[Gg][Ii][Tt][Hh][Uu][Bb][Uu][Ss][Ee][Rr][Cc][Oo][Nn][Tt][Ee][Nn][Tt]\.[Cc][Oo][Mm]/ OR /.*[Aa][Nn][Oo][Nn][Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee][Ss]\.[Cc][Oo][Mm]/ OR /.*[Cc][Dd][Nn]\.[Dd][Ii][Ss][Cc][Oo][Rr][Dd][Aa][Pp][Pp]\.[Cc][Oo][Mm]/ OR /.*[Cc][Dd][Nn]\.[Dd][Ii][Ss][Cc][Oo][Rr][Dd][Aa][Pp][Pp]\.[Cc][Oo][Mm]\/[Aa][Tt][Tt][Aa][Cc][Hh][Mm][Ee][Nn][Tt][Ss]\// OR /.*[Dd][Dd][Nn][Ss]\.[Nn][Ee][Tt]/ OR /.*[Dd][Ll]\.[Dd][Rr][Oo][Pp][Bb][Oo][Xx][Uu][Ss][Ee][Rr][Cc][Oo][Nn][Tt][Ee][Nn][Tt]\.[Cc][Oo][Mm]/ OR /.*[Gg][Hh][Oo][Ss][Tt][Bb][Ii][Nn]\.[Cc][Oo]/ OR /.*[Gg][Oo][Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee]\.[Ii][Oo]/ OR /.*[Hh][Aa][Ss][Tt][Ee][Bb][Ii][Nn]\.[Cc][Oo][Mm]/ OR /.*[Mm][Ee][Dd][Ii][Aa][Ff][Ii][Rr][Ee]\.[Cc][Oo][Mm]/ OR /.*[Mm][Ee][Gg][Aa]\.[Nn][Zz]/ OR /.*[Pp][Aa][Ss][Tt][Ee]\.[Ee][Ee]/ OR /.*[Pp][Aa][Ss][Tt][Ee][Bb][Ii][Nn]\.[Cc][Oo][Mm]/ OR /.*[Pp][Aa][Ss][Tt][Ee][Bb][Ii][Nn]\.[Pp][Ll]/ OR /.*[Pp][Aa][Ss][Tt][Ee][Tt][Ee][Xx][Tt]\.[Nn][Ee][Tt]/ OR /.*[Pp][Rr][Ii][Vv][Aa][Tt][Ll][Aa][Bb]\.[Cc][Oo][Mm]/ OR /.*[Pp][Rr][Ii][Vv][Aa][Tt][Ll][Aa][Bb]\.[Nn][Ee][Tt]/ OR /.*[Ss][Ee][Nn][Dd]\.[Ee][Xx][Pp][Ll][Oo][Ii][Tt]\.[Ii][Nn]/ OR /.*[Ss][Ee][Nn][Dd][Ss][Pp][Aa][Cc][Ee]\.[Cc][Oo][Mm]/ OR /.*[Ss][Tt][Oo][Rr][Aa][Gg][Ee]\.[Gg][Oo][Oo][Gg][Ll][Ee][Aa][Pp][Ii][Ss]\.[Cc][Oo][Mm]/ OR /.*[Ss][Tt][Oo][Rr][Jj][Ss][Hh][Aa][Rr][Ee]\.[Ii][Oo]/ OR /.*[Tt][Ee][Mm][Pp]\.[Ss][Hh]/ OR /.*[Tt][Rr][Aa][Nn][Ss][Ff][Ee][Rr]\.[Ss][Hh]/ OR /.*[Uu][Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee]\.[Ii][Oo]/)))
